    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Paillier()
      The Paillier function takes in two BigIntegers and returns a new BigInteger that is the result of encrypting the first parameter with the second.

        Returns the product of two BigIntegers modulo nsquare.

      • decrypt

        public BigInteger decrypt(BigInteger c)
        Decrypts the given ciphertext using the Paillier cryptosystem.
        Parameters:
        c - the ciphertext to decrypt, represented as a BigInteger.
        Returns:
        the decrypted plaintext, represented as a BigInteger.
